title: How to See Who Watched Your Snapchat Story

steps.title: Open Snapchat.
steps.content: Open Snapchat. This looks like a white ghost on a yellow background. If you aren't already logged in , tap Log in to do so now. [1] X Research source Use this method to check how many views your personal Story has and which added friends watched it. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. This will be at the top-left corner, regardless of which tab you're in. A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap My Story.
steps.content: Tap My Story . This will open your Story. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Swipe up on the Snap.
steps.content: Swipe up on the Snap. You'll see a list of up to 200 Snapchat users who viewed your Story. If you have over 200 viewers, you won't see any additional names, but you'll see a number. [4] X Research source You can change who can see your Story in your privacy settings.

steps.title: Open Snapchat.
steps.content: Open Snapchat. This looks like a white ghost on a yellow background. If you aren't already logged in, tap Log in to do so now. [5] X Research source Use this method if you're a creator and want to check how many viewers your Public Story has. [6] X Research source Always be sure to post within Snapchat's guidelines and avoid uploading any personal or identifiable information to stay safe .

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. This will be at the top-left corner, regardless of which tab you're in. [7] X Research source A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap My Public Profile.
steps.content: Tap My Public Profile . This should be above the My Stories header. [8] X Research source The Insights and Replies page will open.

steps.title: View the Insights.
steps.content: View the Insights. You'll see the number of viewers, both followers and non-followers, next to the eyeball icon. You can also see how many replies you received, and if any users took a screenshot. [9] X Research source Tap a reply underneath Story Replies to view or send a reply to a user. Underneath My Friends , you'll see added friends that have seen your Public Story.
